channel.title: Um fix spawn?
channel.description:
Sorry if this has been fixed since yesterday... but lots of griefing has been going on over the past week at W2 spawn, including destruction of the diamond portal!!
It's kinda annoying because I sometimes walk through the portal coordinates accidentally, and it's probably mega confusing for newcomers.

item.title: Um fix spawn?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:20, topic:418082”]Maybe when you destroyed it you could have replaced it with dirt or stone or ANYTHING! It was hard to find, but I’ve built it out of bedrock now, try not to destroy the signs on it explaining things.[/quote]No one can place blocks there only destroy them.

Read full topic

item.title: Um fix spawn?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Just something to let people know where it is exactly When I first went to world two yesterday I went through world 1 portal and then go there and went back through it within seconds lol. Had to go back and get more cacti

item.title: Um fix spawn?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:418082”]I thought you guys didn’t want spawn protection? (the kind that protected really far out in the nether). I tried to set up a small residence there, but the residence plugin kept deleting it for no reason at all, so it’s obviously bugged. I guess I could op myself and create the portal out of bedrock.[/quote]Protection of the portal is all that matters, so yeah make it out of bedrock.

Read full topic

item.title: Um fix spawn?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:418082”]I thought you guys didn’t want spawn protection? (the kind that protected really far out in the nether). I tried to set up a small residence there, but the residence plugin kept deleting it for no reason at all, so it’s obviously bugged. I guess I could op myself and create the portal out of bedrock.[/quote]Didn’t you op yourself to get the diamond blocks anyway? Just do the same yea for bedrock

But rolling people back wouldn’t have done anything except possibly help duping, because they could easily transfer it to a different account

Read full topic

Moparisthebest:

I thought you guys didn’t want spawn protection? (the kind that protected really far out in the nether). I tried to set up a small residence there, but the residence plugin kept deleting it for no reason at all, so it’s obviously bugged. I guess I could op myself and create the portal out of bedrock.

there is spawn protection… the only issue is we’re able to destroy blocks but we cant place them

but yea make the portal out of bedrock

item.title: Um fix spawn?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:12, topic:418082”]I don’t understand why we couldn’t just leave them, if people took them, I could have banned them and rolled it back?[/quote]Would you really want to do that? I mean it would be an endless cycle. Is there no way for you to protect the portal?

Read full topic

item.title: Um fix spawn?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I don’t understand why we couldn’t just leave them, if people took them, I could have banned them and rolled it back?

or you could fix the protection so people cant destroy blocks in the first place… we just took it into our hands to stop it before people even had a chance to exploit it, a better decision if you ask me, considering if the diamonds were stored in their chests, they would still be there if the people were rolled back

Read full topic

item.title: Um fix spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Agentmoose and reyx7 destroyed the portal, they say it’s to stop people destroying it for diamonds. As for the spawn area I don’t notice anything different? (I’ve never really looked around spawn so if an air raid occurred I probably wouldn’t be able to tell the difference)
